Uses of Package
sage.texture

  • Packages that use sage.texture 
    Package Description
    sage.model.loader.ogreXML  
    sage.scene  
    sage.scene.state  
    sage.scene.state.jogl  
    sage.texture  
  • Classes in sage.texture used by sage.model.loader.ogreXML 
    Class and Description
    Texture.ApplyMode
    ApplyMode specifies how texels are applied (combined with the current pixel value).
  • Classes in sage.texture used by sage.scene 
    Class and Description
    Texture
    Texture is an abstract base class defining a texture object to be used to display an image on a piece of geometry.
  • Classes in sage.texture used by sage.scene.state 
    Class and Description
    Texture
    Texture is an abstract base class defining a texture object to be used to display an image on a piece of geometry.
    Texture.ApplyMode
    ApplyMode specifies how texels are applied (combined with the current pixel value).
    Texture.CombinerFunctionAlpha 
    Texture.CombinerFunctionRGB
    Specifies the way in which the texture combiner unit will combine its incoming arguments.
    Texture.CombinerOperandAlpha 
    Texture.CombinerOperandRGB 
    Texture.CombinerSource
    Specifies what the texture unit will choose as its incoming source argument.
    Texture.DepthTextureCompareFunc
    The shadowing texture compare function
    Texture.DepthTextureCompareMode
    The shadowing texture compare mode
    Texture.DepthTextureMode
    The type of depth texture translation to output
    Texture.MagnificationFilter
    MagnificationFilter specifies the different magnification filtering operations which can be applied by a Texture.
    Texture.MinificationFilter
    MinificationFilter specifies the different minification filtering operations which can be applied by a Texture.
    Texture.TextureType
    TextureType defines the different types of textures which are supported.
    Texture.WrapMode
    WrapMode specifies the different wrapping modes which can be applied by a Texture.
  • Classes in sage.texture used by sage.scene.state.jogl 
    Class and Description
    Texture
    Texture is an abstract base class defining a texture object to be used to display an image on a piece of geometry.
    Texture.ApplyMode
    ApplyMode specifies how texels are applied (combined with the current pixel value).
    Texture2D
    Texture2D subclasses Texture to represent a concrete 2D texture.
  • Classes in sage.texture used by sage.texture 
    Class and Description
    Texture
    Texture is an abstract base class defining a texture object to be used to display an image on a piece of geometry.
    Texture.ApplyMode
    ApplyMode specifies how texels are applied (combined with the current pixel value).
    Texture.CombinerFunctionAlpha 
    Texture.CombinerFunctionRGB
    Specifies the way in which the texture combiner unit will combine its incoming arguments.
    Texture.CombinerOperandAlpha 
    Texture.CombinerOperandRGB 
    Texture.CombinerScale 
    Texture.CombinerSource
    Specifies what the texture unit will choose as its incoming source argument.
    Texture.DepthTextureCompareFunc
    The shadowing texture compare function
    Texture.DepthTextureCompareMode
    The shadowing texture compare mode
    Texture.DepthTextureMode
    The type of depth texture translation to output
    Texture.EnvironmentMapMode
    EnvironmentMapMode specifies the algorithm to be used for automatic texture coordinate generation.
    Texture.MagnificationFilter
    MagnificationFilter specifies the different magnification filtering operations which can be applied by a Texture.
    Texture.MinificationFilter
    MinificationFilter specifies the different minification filtering operations which can be applied by a Texture.
    Texture.RenderToTextureType
    When doing RenderToTexture operations with this texture, this value indicates what content to render into this texture.
    Texture.TextureType
    TextureType defines the different types of textures which are supported.
    Texture.WrapAxis
    WrapAxis specifies the axis on which wrapping occurs.
    Texture.WrapMode
    WrapMode specifies the different wrapping modes which can be applied by a Texture.
    TextureKey
    TextureKey provides hash keys for BufferedImages, which are then used by the TextureManager to cache and retrieve Texture objects.
